review: Dr . Chitra is one of the most important and special person we have ever met .Indeed she is a very experienced doctor and caring doctor. My daughter was diagnosed with scarcoidosis and scleroderma in 2016 .She is the doctor who diagnosed it and started the treatment . Even many doctors of Bangladesh couldn't give their opinion on it but she did a successful treatment **** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** * My daughter says that She wants to be like her .sending lots of love and prayers from Bangladesh.
